headline: Leidos Holdings (LDOS): Examining Valuation as Investor Interest Builds
summary: Leidos Holdings (LDOS) continues to draw investor interest as its diverse portfolio of national security and technology solutions remains in focus. Shares have experienced mild moves over the past week, which encourages a closer look at the stock's longer-term performance and valuation. See our latest analysis for Leidos Holdings. Leidos Holdings’ share price has built steady momentum lately, with a year-to-date gain of 32.84% and a strong one-year total shareholder return of 17.32%. This...
